title: Gabriela Kownacka
text:
Gabriela Anna Kownacka (née Kwasz) (25 May 1952 – 30 November 2010) was a Polish film and stage actress, best known for playing in the Polish TV series "<a href="Rodzina%20zast%C4%99pcza">Rodzina zastępcza</a>". Kownacka was a <a href="Lutheranism">Lutheran</a>.
Kownacka died on 30 November 2010, aged 58, after a long battle with breast cancer that began in 2004.
On 7 December 2010, she was interred at the <a href="Evangelical%20Cemetery%20of%20the%20Augsburg%20Confession%20in%20Warsaw">Evangelical Cemetery of the Augsburg Confession in Warsaw</a>.
